EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPVideo.IP-Video.Anyvision.N.G.N.18383.Anyvision Nurture.Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: From television to Any Vision
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Any Vision is coming – are you ready? On-demand Webinar This inspirational on-demand webinar talks about the future of television with a focus on the end user experience about ten years from now. Join Roland Mestric, Nokia’s Head of IP video marketing as he shares important insights and introduces Any Vision – Nokia’s bold prediction for the television and video industry.
Access the Any Vision webinar <[[https://pages.nokia.com/15571.Anyvision.A.bold.prediction.at.the.future.of.television.html]]> now to see what transformational changes lie ahead and how to benefit from the Any Vision world. More on Any Vision: Visit our website <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/ip-video/anyvision]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
